title: Who are the best laptop manufacturers today? - Quora

response.answer_text: According to atulhost’s review about the best laptop brands - Dell and Lenovo. Apple is behind these days because of major thermal as well as keyboard issues. HP, Acer, Asus, and MSI are some well-known laptop brands. Microsft and Razer brands are not available everywhere.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Kartik Kumar(कार्तिक कुमार)
